> The diff coverage is `41.66%`.

[![Impacted file tree graph](https://codecov.io/gh/pandas-dev/pandas/pull/16271/graphs/tree.svg?width=650&height=150&src=pr&token=eZ4WkYLtcO)](https://codecov.io/gh/pandas-dev/pandas/pull/16271?src=pr&el=tree)

```diff
==========================================

==========================================
- Hits        45981    45961      -20     
+ Misses       4927     4911      -16
```

| [pandas/io/gbq.py](https://codecov.io/gh/pandas-dev/pandas/pull/16271?src=pr&el=tree#diff-cGFuZGFzL2lvL2dicS5weQ==) | `25% <0%> (-58.34%)` | :arrow_down: |
| [pandas/core/frame.py](https://codecov.io/gh/pandas-dev/pandas/pull/16271?src=pr&el=tree#diff-cGFuZGFzL2NvcmUvZnJhbWUucHk=) | `97.59% <0%> (-0.1%)` | :arrow_down: |

@jreback : Not sure what `codecov` is complaining about.  However, I made all of the requested changes, and everything else is green.

@gfyoung yeah I am about ready to disable codecov. It is pretty bogus. I haven't been able to make it use the latest master as the comparison (not really sure why) and their help services are not very helpful :< 

if you want to have a look at other code coverage services we could easily switch.
